article: bp was downgraded by vetr from a `` buy '' rating to a `` hold '' rating in a report issued on tuesday , december 12th . they presently have a $ 41.28 price target on the oil and gas exploration company 's stock . vetr 's price objective indicates a potential downside of 0.02 % from the company 's previous close . several other equities analysts also recently commented on bp . piper jaffray companies reaffirmed a `` buy '' rating and issued a $ 39.00 price objective on shares of bp in a research report on thursday , september 28th .

scotiabank reaffirmed a `` buy '' rating and issued a $ 39.00 price objective on shares of bp in a research report on wednesday , november 1st . bidaskclub downgraded bp from a `` sell '' rating to a `` strong sell '' rating in a research report on thursday , august 17th . thestreet raised bp from a `` c '' rating to a `` b '' rating in a research report on wednesday , november 8th . finally , cowen reaffirmed a `` hold '' rating and issued a $ 39.00 price objective on shares of bp in a research report on tuesday , october 24th .

three research analysts have rated the stock with a sell rating , eight have assigned a hold rating , nine have assigned a buy rating and one has given a strong buy rating to the company . the company currently has an average rating of `` hold '' and a consensus price target of $ 38.63 . bp traded down $ 0.39 during trading hours on tuesday , reaching $ 41.29 . the company had a trading volume of 4,088,941 shares , compared to its average volume of 5,399,357 . the stock has a market cap of $ 137,453.89 , a price-to-earnings ratio of 35.29 , a peg ratio of 1.23 and a beta of 0.97 .

the company has a quick ratio of 0.88 , a current ratio of 1.18 and a debt-to-equity ratio of 0.57 . bp has a one year low of $ 33.10 and a one year high of $ 41.76 . several hedge funds and other institutional investors have recently modified their holdings of bp . denver investment advisors llc lifted its stake in shares of bp by 56.5 % during the 2nd quarter . denver investment advisors llc now owns 9,903 shares of the oil and gas exploration company 's stock worth $ 343,000 after purchasing an additional 3,577 shares during the last quarter .

proficio capital partners llc lifted its stake in shares of bp by 4.9 % during the 2nd quarter . proficio capital partners llc now owns 25,032 shares of the oil and gas exploration company 's stock worth $ 911,000 after purchasing an additional 1,163 shares during the last quarter . blair william & co. . il lifted its stake in shares of bp by 13.1 % during the 2nd quarter . blair william & co. . il now owns 380,525 shares of the oil and gas exploration company 's stock worth $ 13,185,000 after purchasing an additional 44,168 shares during the last quarter .

one capital management llc lifted its stake in shares of bp by 3.8 % during the 2nd quarter . one capital management llc now owns 50,890 shares of the oil and gas exploration company 's stock worth $ 1,763,000 after purchasing an additional 1,867 shares during the last quarter . finally , geneva advisors llc lifted its stake in shares of bp by 6.2 % during the 2nd quarter . geneva advisors llc now owns 17,011 shares of the oil and gas exploration company 's stock worth $ 589,000 after purchasing an additional 1,000 shares during the last quarter .

the company 's segments include upstream , downstream , rosneft , and other businesses and corporate . the upstream segment is engaged in oil and natural gas exploration , field development and production , as well as midstream transportation , storage and processing . to view vetr 's full report , visit vetr 's official website . receive news & ratings for bp daily - enter your email address below to receive a concise daily summary of the latest news and analysts ' ratings for bp and related companies with marketbeat . com 's free daily email newsletter .
